The answer should be based on visual cues from the audio and video description provided. Please describe what you see on the screen when the narrator mentions using the sniffer bottle to suck up the gold.

Answer: A: A gloved hand holding a small bottle with a green label and using a pipette to draw material from the stream near mossy rocks.
The line heard while the camera shows a close-up of a gloved hand using a knife to scrape rock and pick up a small yellowish piece is option B: "Looks like a nugget in there! Tweezers?"
